Different Crime.Crime Name: Inadmissibility under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
credibility_assessment: male applicant's claims of non-combat roles
evidence_assessment: CBSA provided a report recommending inadmissibility
Canadian Embassy requested details of the applicant's military service
decision_outcome: application for judicial review was dismissed
criminality_inadmissibility: inadmissible if they are a prescribed senior official in a government engaging in human rights violations
